column5: YOU WILL FIND in the DIARIES a LOT of POLITICS AND EVEN MORE CATS     THE PERSON who MAKES the FIRST COMMENT WILL GET TWO CATS EVERY PERSON WHO COMMENTS WILL GET A CAT     RULES IN THE DIARY WHEN YOU FIND SOMETHING in the DIARY that you LIKE YOU CAN REPOST IT AS COMMENT in the DIARY  PRESIDENT JOE BIDEN Biden honors his mom on Mother's day: "She was the quintessential lady" https://t.co/C3XZPciH7C pic.twitter.com/JMzRwEUaHU  WATCH: President Joe Biden shares special memories of his mom to celebrate #MothersDay pic.twitter.com/7tezF4v62H  KAMALA HARRIS WATCH: @VP Kamala Harris shares happy #MothersDay message and memories of her mom pic.twitter.com/eajsDZH70P  FAUCI Fauci to NBC: "If we get which we will to the goals that the president has established namely if we get 70% of people vaccinated by the 4th of July ... you may see blips but if we handle them well it's unlikely that you'll see the kind of surge that we saw in the late fall." Bob Casey: "It's harder today to get bipartisan agreements on big overarching pieces of legislation. I just think that's a reality that we have to confront today. Larry Hogan: "It bothers me you have to swear fealty to the dear leader or you get kicked out of the party.""It's sort of a circular firing squad where we're just attacking members of our own party instead of focusing on solving problems." @MeetThePress  RUDY GIULIANI Since at least Oct. 2019 federal investigations have been looking into Rudy Giuliani's effort to convince the White House and State Department to grant a visa to a former Ukraine official.The visa issue is one aspect of the federal probe into Giuliani. https://t.co/wnAvR3ZPQu  CAPITOL RIOTER ANTHONY ANTONIO & FOXITIS Alleged Capitol rioter Anthony Antonio was hooked on Fox News and developed "Foxitis" his lawyer said.Antonio according to his lawyer watched Fox constantly for 6 months and developed what his lawyer called "Foxitis" and "Foxmania." https://t.co/QUh8vu8UBV  DEFENCE PRODUCTION ACT Under Trump the Defense Production Act COVID response went toward ship building aviation engineering and body armor manufacturing. President Biden ended that practice ordering the government to reject applications not directly related to fighting COVID. https://t.co/wdAyb7sffj
